content.text: My favorite book is Jane Austen's Pride and Prejudice. What's yours?
I don't read much, but I loved the Lord of the Rings trilogy.
Oh that's a good one! I love the fantasy genre.
Yeah it's pretty great. Do you have any kids?
I have three roommates and they're basically my kids. I love them to death.
Oh that's cool. Are you a good listener?
I think so, yeah. I always try to be there for my friends when they need me.
That's good to hear. I like to write in my journal to process my feelings.
I do that too! It's a great way to get your thoughts out and clear your head.
Yeah it is. Do you like technology?
I love technology! It's so amazing how much we can do with it.
Yeah it is amazing. I drive a truck for a living and I use all sorts of technology to do my job.
That's awesome! I'm not very good with technology, but I'm learning.
It's not that hard once you get the hang of it.
Yeah I'm sure I'll get the hang of it eventually
